array.string:
launchctl setenv XDG_CONFIG_HOME $HOME/.config launchctl setenv XDG_CACHE_HOME $HOME/.cache launchctl setenv XDG_DATA_HOME $HOME/.local/share launchctl setenv XDG_STATE_HOME $HOME/.local/state
launchctl setenv NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/npm/npmrc

launchctl setenv IDEA_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/intellij/ide.properties launchctl setenv CLION_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/clion/ide.properties launchctl setenv APPCODE_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/appcode/ide.properties launchctl setenv DATAGRIP_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/datagrip/ide.properties launchctl setenv STUDIO_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/android_studio/ide.properties launchctl setenv WEBIDE_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/webstorm/ide.properties launchctl setenv GOLAND_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/goland/ide.properties launchctl setenv RUSTOVER_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/rustover/ide.properties

launchctl setenv IDEA_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/intellij/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv CLION_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/clion/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv APPCODE_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/appcode/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv DATAGRIP_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/datagrip/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv STUDIO_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/android_studio/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv WEBIDE_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/webstorm/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv GOLAND_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/goland/ide.vmoptions launchctl setenv RUSTOVER_VM_OPTIONS $HOME/.jetbrains/rustover/ide.vmoptions
